articles.title: Previously hidden sunspot unleashes colossal X-class solar flare as it turns to face Earth - Space.com

articles.content:
A newly emerged sunspot is making its presence known, unleashing a powerful X-class solar flare that triggered shortwave radio blackouts across the South Pacific.

articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope spots Milky Way-like galaxies lurking in the early Universe - BBC Science Focus Magazine
articles.description: Two of the six barred galaxies imaged are 11 billion years old - the oldest ever discovered.
articles.content: NASAs James Webb Space Telescope has come up with the goods again. Images released by the space agency show some of the oldest ever discovered barred galaxies. The galaxies feature so-called stellar … [+1957 chars]

articles.title: Perseverance rover marks 1 Mars year on Red Planet - Space.com
articles.description: Perseverance starts its extended mission on Saturday (Jan. 7).
articles.content:
NASA's Perseverance Mars rover is wrapping up its prime mission on the Red Planet.
